verbs.description: [ARG0: A federal judge] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [V: asked] [ARG1: pointed questions about special counsel Robert Mueller 's authority to bring charges against former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort] and suggested that prosecutors ' true motive is getting Manafort to " sing " against the president . Manafort 's lawyers argued at a hearing in Alexandria that the tax and bank fraud charges are far afield from Mueller 's mandate to investigate Russian meddling in the 2016 election and whether any coordination with Trump associates occurred."I do n't see what relationship this indictment has with what the special counsel is investigating , " U.S. Senior Judge T.S.
